recipesJson.name: Down with the Sprinkles
recipesJson.author: Demented76
recipesJson.description: If you like the sugar cookies from the deli section in all of their greasy glory then you might love to vape them as well.  If you like lighter and crispier sugar cookies then this might not be your jam.  You can use your preferred sweetener and go a little higher as well if you like sweeter vapes.  I admit that I was listening to Disturbed when I chose the name for this recipe lol.
